channel.title: Make Text Colorblind Friendly
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I've talked to a couple of players who really struggle with colorblindness with the dialogue boxes. Its hard for them to tell different actions apart. It'd be a really simple and helpful fix to tweak a few text colors to be friendly to those with the very common red-green blindness.
Thanks for the consideration :D

item.title: Make Text Colorblind Friendly
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
I’d suggest a colorblind mode, yeah. Dividing important color-differences up by luminosity is the main thing (and will work for all forms of colorblindness.)

Read full topic

item.title: Make Text Colorblind Friendly
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Honestly, just add a colorblind mode (or several?).

Now, that being said, it’s probably hard to figure out what you need to do for colorblind people to see something if you yourself aren’t colorblind. Why not ask these people what in particular they find hard to read and how they think it should be changed?
